items.title: Atlantic dolphins are dying much younger. Scientists sound the alarm
bullets: • Common dolphins in the North Atlantic are living significantly shorter lives, with female longevity dropping seven years since the 1990s

• The findings expose flaws in traditional counting methods and call for adaptive conservation measures

items.title: The bold model stopping deforestation in its tracks
bullets: • Rainforests are powerful carbon sinks and crucial to climate stability
• A pioneering effort to protect them involves providing cash to forest communities so they don't need to accept offers from loggers
• The first time the loggers came to Saipa’s rainforest village was in the 1990s

items.title: A classified network of SpaceX satellites is emitting a mysterious signal
bullets: • Satellites associated with the Starshield satellite network appear to be transmitting to the Earth's surface on frequencies normally used for doing the opposite: sending commands from Earth to satellites in space
• The use of those frequencies to "downlink" data runs counter to standards set by the International Telecommunication Union

items.title: Meta is reportedly downsizing its legacy AI research team
bullets: • The layoffs will reportedly impact Meta’s Fundamental AI Research unit, also known as FAIR, along with its AI product and infrastructure division

• Over the summer, Meta kicked off an AI hiring spree after investing $14.3 billion in Scale AI and hiring CEO Alexandr Wang
